text: David Lim may refer to: * David Lim (mountaineer), Singaporean mountaineer and motivational speaker * David Lim (swimmer) (born 1966), former Singapore national swimmer and current national coach * David Lim (water polo) (born 1938), Singaporean Olympic water polo player * David Lim Kim San (born 1933), Singaporean music educator, administrator and conductor * David Lim (actor) (born 1983), American actor and model
title: David Lim
